```{r}
#How far to make a choice?

N <- 100

make_choice <- function(N, split_number){
  input_list <- sample(1:N,N,replace=FALSE)
  best <- max(input_list[1:split_number])
  if(best == N)  return(0)
  for(m in input_list[(split_number+1):N]){
    if (m > best) {
      best <- m
      break
    }
  }
  return(best)
}

find_optimal <- function(){
  opt <- list()
  for(i in 1:(N/2)){
    count <- 0
    for(j in 1:7000){    #Increase to 7000 to improve accuracy
      best <- make_choice(N,i)
      if(best == N) count <- count + 1
    }
    prob <- count/100
    opt <- c(opt, prob)
  }
  opt_split <- which.max(opt)
  print(opt_split)
}

find_optimal()
```
